de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.mapping

Interface IMapperFactory


  • public interface IMapperFactory
    IMapperFactory is responsible to create and store instances of IMapper for all classes, which shall be persisted into the datastore

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IDataStore getDataStore()
      Get the IDataStore which created the current instance
      <T> IMapper<T> getMapper(java.lang.Class<T> mapperClass)
      Retrieve the IMapper for the given class
      IPropertyMapperFactory getPropertyMapperFactory()
      Get the instance of IPropertyMapperFactory which is used by the current implementation
      IStoreObjectFactory<?> getStoreObjectFactory()
      Get the IStoreObjectFactory suitable for the current instance
      ITypeHandlerFactory getTypeHandlerFactory()
      Get the propriate ITypeHandlerFactory for the current implementation
      boolean isMapper(java.lang.Class<?> mapperClass)
      Returns true, if the given class specifies a mappable class.

        Retrieve the IMapper for the given class
        Parameters:
        mapperClass -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - any Exception which can occur in the init process

      • isMapper

        boolean isMapper(java.lang.Class<?> mapperClass)
        Returns true, if the given class specifies a mappable class. At a minimum whic method will have to check, wether the class is marked with the Entity annotation
        Parameters:
        mapperClass - the class to be checkd
        Returns:
        true, if class specifies a mapper, false otherwise
